map_option.name: SolarSnake
map_option.description: Should we use the solar snake mode?

choice_value.description: This is a normal tessellation map.

Planets are organized into a series of snaking lines, with only one path between all planets. This can lead to very challenging games since you can't easily bypass strong planets.
Be sure to turn off random extra connections if you really want it to be true Solar Snake.
